com.google.android.exoplayer.chunk

Class Format

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer.chunk.Format

  • public class Format
extends java.lang.Object
    A format definition for streams.

      • mimeType

        The mime type of the format.

      • width

        public final int width
        The width of the video in pixels, or -1 for non-video formats.

      • height

        The height of the video in pixels, or -1 for non-video formats.

      • numChannels

        public final int numChannels
        The number of audio channels, or -1 for non-audio formats.

      • audioSamplingRate

        public final int audioSamplingRate
        The audio sampling rate in Hz, or -1 for non-audio formats.

      • bitrate

        public final int bitrate
        The average bandwidth in bits per second.

      • language

        public final java.lang.String language
        The language of the format. Can be null if unknown.

        The language codes are two-letter lowercase ISO language codes (such as "en") as defined by ISO 639-1.

      • bandwidth

        @Deprecated
public final int bandwidth
        Deprecated. Use bitrate. However note that the units of measurement are different.
        The average bandwidth in bytes per second.

        Parameters:
        id - The format identifier.
        mimeType - The format mime type.
        width - The width of the video in pixels, or -1 for non-video formats.
        height - The height of the video in pixels, or -1 for non-video formats.
        numChannels - The number of audio channels, or -1 for non-audio formats.
        audioSamplingRate - The audio sampling rate in Hz, or -1 for non-audio formats.
        bitrate - The average bandwidth of the format in bits per second.
